paper_abstract: Let G be a simple graph with n vertices and let lambda(1), lambda(2),..., lambda(n) be the eigenvalues of its adjacency matrix. The Estrada index EE of G is the sum of the terms e(lambda i). In 2009 Ilic et al. obtained the trees with minimal Estrada index among trees with a given maximum vertex degree. In this paper, we give the trees with minimal Estrada index among the trees of order n with exactly two vertices of maximum degree.
paper_title: The Minimal Estrada Index of Trees with Two Maximum Degree Vertices
